system.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose
system.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an organized set of ideas, methods, or ways of working
system.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I don’t understand your filing system.
We’ve got a good system for dealing with complaints from customers.
Under the present system, we do not have any flexibility.
system.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a group of computers that are connected to each other
system.translation[0].definitions[3].def: the use of sensible and organized methods
system.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: We need a bit more system in the way we organize our files.
